title: Why do we need to study the different disciplines of social science? - Quora

response.answer_text: I studied Sociology and Psychology - and in both subjects we had to study the different approaches and disciplines of the subjects, and that was in 1976. I also asked the same question then and the answer I got was to expose you to different schools of thought - so you can choose the discipline you’re going to use. But it didn’t make sense to me then and not now.

So what is social sciences in my country It consists of two parts:history and geography History is about our country and the lessons we can learn and people who struggled for our country Geography teaches us about the world,maps,etc These are two important things that we will need in our daily life and to appreciate our country and the things it established ,one simple thing is roads,freedom,rights we need to understand the system and therefore we study it
